rows.label: qst202831_msg0001
rows.name:
When the battle is over and
there is peace in the world...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202831_msg0002
rows.name:
I'd like to go searching for
ores with everyone again.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0003
rows.name:
And next time, I'd like
to name it Rexinium.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0004
rows.name: Huh? My name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0005
rows.name: I don't mind, but...[ML:Dash ] why my name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0006
rows.name:
And next time, I'd like
to name it Nianite.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0007
rows.name: My name on an ore?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0008
rows.name: I don't mind, but...[ML:Dash ] why my name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0009
rows.name:
And next time, I'd like
to name it Melephite.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0010
rows.name: My name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0011
rows.name:
I do not mind, but why
would you choose my name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0012
rows.name:
And next time, I'd like
to name it Zekerock.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0013
rows.name: My name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0014
rows.name:
I don't mind, but why
would you use my name?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0015
rows.name: You said it earlier, didn't you?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0016
rows.name:
Even if I don't remember
myself, as long as the ore
named Menou exists...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202831_msg0017
rows.name:
I will live on in
everyone's memories...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202831_msg0018
rows.name:
I wanted to leave Rex's name
in the world in the same way.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0019
rows.name:
I wanted to leave Nia's name
in the world in the same way.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0020
rows.name:
I wanted to leave Meleph's name
in the world in the same way.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0021
rows.name:
I wanted to leave Zeke's name
in the world in the same way.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0022
rows.name: That way, even if I lose my memories,

rows.label: qst202831_msg0023
rows.name:
the ore we found together will
remain, along with your name, right?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0024
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Oh, I've said something
rather embarrassing.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0025
rows.name:
Please keep this a secret
from the others, okay?
